Description:
High School degree, technical degree, or equivalent. Certification in nail artistry is a plus.
3 plus years of experience in a related field.
Ability to work in a fast-paced and team-oriented environment.
Flexibility to work evenings, weekends, and holidays.
Strong communication and customer service skills.
Strong attention to detail and a keen eye for aesthetics.
Good knowledge of nail care products and trends.Job Details
